scripts.android: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && npx react-native run-android --variant=DevDebug --appIdSuffix 'dev'
scripts.android:uat: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && react-native run-android --variant=UatDebug --appIdSuffix 'uat'
scripts.android:prod: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && react-native run-android --variant=ProdDebug
scripts.install:android: yarn init:project && npx jetify && yarn android
scripts.install:android:uat: yarn init:project && npx jetify && yarn android:uat
scripts.install:android:prod: yarn init:project && npx jetify && yarn android:prod
scripts.install:ios: yarn init:project && npx pod-install && yarn ios
scripts.install:ios:uat: yarn init:project && npx pod-install && yarn ios:uat
scripts.install:ios:prod: yarn init:project && npx pod-install && yarn ios:prod
scripts.build:android:uat: rm -rf android/app/build && yarn install:package && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew assembleUatRelease && cd ../
scripts.build:android:prod: rm -rf android/app/build && yarn install:package && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProdRelease && cd ../
scripts.build:ios:uat: rm -rf ios/build && yarn install:package && npx pod-install && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SwatApp.xcworkspace -configuration "UatRelease" -scheme "SwatApp (UAT)" -sdk iphoneos archive -derivedDataPath ios/build/SwatApp
scripts.build:ios:prod: rm -rf ios/build && yarn install:package && npx pod-install && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SwatApp.xcworkspace -configuration "ProdRelease" -scheme "SwatApp (PROD)" -sdk iphoneos archive -derivedDataPath ios/build/SwatApp
scripts.test:ui: npm install -g detox-cli && detox build && detox test
scripts.nodev: nvm alias default 18.16.0 && nvm use default
